Goblin.Info: A common goblin. Crafty and found almost everywhere in the world. A couple of swings to the head finishes them off quickly.

Hobgoblin.Info: A slightly stronger variant of the goblin, but only slightly. You might need an extra swing to the head for this one.

Goblin Thief.Info: The 'glass cannon' of goblins. More hard-hitting and speedier than its regular counterparts, but also much weaker.

Breaker Goblin.Info: A stronger variant of the goblin. Tread with caution: this enemy is the bane of new adventurers.

Blue Slime.Info: A seemingly harmless creature. These slimes can soak up a few hits.

Massive Toad.Info: An abnormally massive toad. It resembles a fungal balloon.

Living Tuft.Info: A threat that goes unseen unless you look hard enough. Its head mimics a razor-sharp grass tuft.

Water Elemental.Info: It hits with overwhelming tidal power. Its water-like body allows it to morph to take less damage from attacks.

Treant.Info: A common enemy in the jungle that resembles a sentient tree.

Pixie.Info: A glowing spirit that roams the jungles. It zaps passerby adventurers with magic essence.

Overgrown Treant.Info: A bigger counterpart of the treant. It takes more hits but doesn't hit as hard.

Totem Golem.Info: An ancient being of the jungle that guards the monument. It is slow moving but has overwhelming strength.

Lesser Felguard.Info: Lesser Felguards guard small corrupted fields. They wield great swords forged from the depths of hell.

Imp.Info: Small fiendish beings born from small chambers of corruption. They are agile and attack with acid and tough horns.

Fel Beast.Info: Strong beasts that accompany Lesser Felguards and Imps to carry out evil biddings.
